title: Universe/Dynamics/SystemGravity
description: Configuration for SystemGravity in dynamics plugin. Note that a separate DynamicsPlugin's SystemGravity has to be defined for each point being propagated, even if using the same GravityPlugin's SystemGravity.

model.description: Name of the gravity model in the gravity plugin to be used

body.description: Optional body for which to compute the gravitational acceleration. This should be set if the point being propagated is massive and corresponds to a body in SystemGravity.
body.default: automatically generated body with null GM (body mass neglected, e.g. for spacecraft)

switch.description: Optional flag to enable COI switch for propagated body or not

disableIndirectAcc.description: Optional flag to disable indirect accelerations computation, e.g. if the COI is a planetary system barycenter

coi.description: COI point name, only used if the point is not propagated (otherwise overwritten by propagator)
coi.default: COI is left unconfigured until propagator is initialised
